title: India's Bilateral-Investment-Treaty Shift: Empowering States Through Counterclaims

fullContent: Sara Fischer / Axios: Patreon CEO Jack Conte says the platform paid out $10B+ to creators since its 2013 founding, creators now get $2B+ annually, and there are 25M+ paid memberships  Creators on Patreon have received more than $10 billion in payouts from fans since the company was founded in 2013, CEO and co-founder Jack Conte tells Axios.

title: ED To Summon Anil Ambani Again After 7-10 Days In Loan Fraud Case
summary: Anil Ambani was asked to appear before the ED on Tuesday for questioning in connection to the loan fraud case linked to Reliance Group entities.

title: SEBI has ordered disgorgement of Rs 949 crore in 76 cases of fraud: Minister
summary: The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has taken up 76 investment-related fraud cases during the five-year period from April 2020 to March 2025, in which the culprits were ordered to disgorge Rs 949. 43 crore as illicit gains, the Parliament was informed on Tuesday.
fullContent: The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has taken up 76 investment-related fraud cases during the five-year period from April 2020 to March 2025, in which the culprits were ordered to disgorge Rs 949. 43 crore as illicit gains, the Parliament was informed on Tuesday.
